greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. Product_{i>k} exp(x^i).
formula: A(0,k) = 1, A(1,k) = A(2,k) = ... = A(k,k) = 0 and A(n,k) = Sum_{i=k..n-1} (i+1)!*binomial(n-1,i)*A(n-1-i,k) for n > k.
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
seq(seq(A(n,d-n), n=0..d), d=0..12);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 29 2017
mathematica: Table[A[n, d-n], {d, 0, 12}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 07 2020 *)
program: (1..n).each{|i| ary << (k..i - 1).inject(0){|s, j| s + f(j + 1) * ncr(i - 1, j) * ary[i - 1 - j]}}
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 29 2017
